mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TRAIN_ROUTE ( TRAIN_ROUTE_ID, ADULT_CHARGE, DEP_PLACE_NAME, ARR_PLACE_NAME, DEP_PLAND_TIME, ARR_PLAND_TIME, TRAIN_GRADE_NAME, TRAIN_NO ) VALUES ( TRAIN_ROUTE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{adultCharge}, #{depPlaceName}, #{arrPlaceName}, #{depPlandtime}, #{arrPlandTime}, #{trainGradeName}, #{trainNo} )
